mean_cn: n. 摘要, 概要, 简短声明;  诉讼要点;  adj. 短暂的, 短时间的;  vt. 作…的摘要;

mean_cn: n. 家伙, 男人;  同伴;  adj. 同事的, 同伴的;  处于相同情况的, 同类的;  vt. 使…与另一个对等, 使…与另一个匹敌;

sentence: If I had Brock's point of view, I wouldn't be able to do anything.

mean_cn: 效法某人, 以某人为榜样

After a month of working eighteen hours a day, I am completely burned out.

words: on the one hand...on the other hand...

sentence_tra: 每周我都量一下腰围来看我掉了多少斤肉。

sentence: My childhood was a happy and innocent time - I was lucky.
sentence_tra: 我的童年是一段快乐天真的时光，我很幸运。

mean_cn: n.安全，防护措施；债券，抵押
sentence: There's no security software on this computer - no wonder you've been hacked!
sentence_tra: 这台电脑没有防护软件，难怪你被黑了。

sentence: We have rented an apartment - now to buy some furniture.
sentence_tra: 我们租了一套公寓，现在该去买些家具了。

mean_cn: n.分歧；意见不合；争执，争论；不同，差异
sentence: A small disagreement turned into a big argument, then we broke up.
sentence_tra: 一个小分歧酿成一场争吵，最后我们分手了。

sentence: Ugh - this food tastes horrible!
sentence_tra: 啊，这东西的味道太可怕了！

sentence: I know I've been bad, but please have mercy on me!
sentence_tra: 我知道是我不好，但请宽恕我！

sentence: Make sure your subject is in focus before taking the photo.
sentence_tra: 拍照前要确保你的物体对焦。

sentence: I want to apologize for going to dinner with my ex-girlfriend. I'm so sorry!
sentence_tra: 和前女友出去吃饭的事情，我感到非常抱歉。

mean_cn: n. 壁联;  vi. 作答;  响应, 做出反应;  vt. 以…作答;
sentence: The little boy responds to the customers.
sentence_tra: 这个小男孩儿接了客人的来电。

sentence: The girl is able to solve the arithmetic problem quickly.
sentence_tra: 这个小女孩能很快解出算术题。

mean_cn: v.背叛，出卖；失信于，辜负；泄露(秘密等)；(非故意地)暴露，显露
sentence: How could she betray my trust?
sentence_tra: 她怎能背叛我的信任。

mean_cn: vi. 得胜, 征服;  vt. 战胜;  克服;  压倒;
sentence: He can overcome the challenge if he tries hard enough.
sentence_tra: 如果他努力尝试，就能战胜困难。

sentence: I put my family photos online to share with my friends.
sentence_tra: 我把我的全家福放在网上来和我的朋友们分享。

sentence: He must truly love you if he gave you flowers.
sentence_tra: 如果他送你花就证明他一定真的爱上你了。

sentence: It's 2012 right now, but before long it'll be 2013.
sentence_tra: 现在是2012，不久以后将是2013.

mean_cn: n. 荒诞;  荒谬作品;  adj. 荒唐的, 滑稽可笑的;
sentence: It's absurd for a grown man to ride so small a bike.
sentence_tra: 成年人骑这么个小自行车是很可笑。

mean_cn: adj. 笨拙的;  不雅观的;  难操纵的;  不便的;  尴尬的;  棘手的;
sentence: It feels awkward to work like this.
sentence_tra: 这个样子工作好窘哪。

sentence: The ship dropped the anchor down for the night.
sentence_tra: 船抛下锚过夜。

sentence: If you commit fraud, you will end up in jail.
sentence_tra: 如果你犯了诈骗罪，你最后的结局就是坐牢。

mean_cn: n. 身份;  个性, 特性;
sentence: The passport is used to verify your identity.
sentence_tra: 护照是用来验明正身的。

mean_cn: n.小型考试，测验，问答比赛v.考查，盘问
sentence: I'm very knowledgeable. I'd be good on a quiz show.
sentence_tra: 我学识渊博，我会在智力竞赛上有很好的表现。

mean_cn: n.妒忌，妒忌的对象v.嫉妒，羡慕
sentence: The single woman feels envy when she sees happy couples.
sentence_tra: 单身女人看到幸福的一对儿的时候很羡慕。

sentence: Can you suggest a topic for the Business Studies paper I have to finish this week?
sentence_tra: 你能给我这周就要完成的商业研究报告建议一个话题吗？

sentence: I always get all the blame, but I never do anything wrong.
sentence_tra: 我总是受到所有的责备，但我从没做错任何事。

sentence: You look so relaxed and cheerful lying there!
sentence_tra: 你躺在那儿看起来好悠闲好开心。

sentence: We sat in the waiting room for many hours.
sentence_tra: 我们在候车室等了好几个小时了。

mean_cn: adv. 真诚地, 诚挚地;  忠实地;
sentence: He apologized sincerely to me, but I still didn't want to forgive him.
sentence_tra: 他很真诚地向我道歉，但我还是不想原谅他。

sentence: Her performance was superb.
sentence_tra: 她的表演很出色。

sentence: I took a picture of her pretending to drive the car.
sentence_tra: 我拍了一张她假装开车的照片。

mean_cn: n.马戏团，杂技团；环形广场
sentence: We saw many animals at the circus.
sentence_tra: 我们在马戏团看到了许多动物。

sentence: The horse walked at a fast pace.
sentence_tra: 马以很快的步速走着。

sentence: The workers argue about whose fault the mistake was.
sentence_tra: 员工们在争论错误是谁犯的。

sentence: I don't know how to solve this algebra problem.
sentence_tra: 我不知道怎么解这个代数题。

sentence: On Easter, Christians like to decorate eggs.
sentence_tra: 在复活节的时候，基督教徒喜欢做彩蛋。

sentence: We can take the trolleybus downtown.
sentence_tra: 我们可以乘坐无轨电车去市中心。

sentence: He really dislikes vegetables. Give him something sweet.
sentence_tra: 他真的不喜欢蔬菜。给他点甜食。

sentence: It's good to be cautious and use your seat belt.
sentence_tra: 系好安全带，小心谨慎是好事。

sentence: Please forgive me! I beg you!
sentence_tra: 对不起，求你原谅我。

sentence: She was a gifted musician, even as a little girl.
sentence_tra: 她是个有天赋的音乐家，即使她是个小女孩。

sentence: The engaged couple had agreed to stay committed to each other.
sentence_tra: 这对已订婚的情侣已经达成协议会忠于对方。

sentence: We should admit our mistakes and learn from them.
sentence_tra: 我们应该承认自己的错误并从中吸取教训。

mean_cn: adj. 热切的, 渴望的, 急不可耐的;
sentence: The kids are eager to eat the ice cream before it melts.
sentence_tra: 孩子们迫不及待地想在冰激凌化之前吃掉它。

sentence: The postman happily delivered mail to every mailbox every day.
sentence_tra: 邮递员每天愉快的把信件投到每个邮箱中。

sentence: You can use a camera to spy on other people.
sentence_tra: 你可以用摄像头监视别人。

mean_cn: n. 评论, 谈论;  vi. 议论;  vt. 评论;
sentence: I read the remark and got the hint.
sentence_tra: 我看了评论并且得到了提示。

sentence: It's only thanks to my rescuer that I am still alive.
sentence_tra: 多亏了我的救命恩人，我才能活下来。

sentence: It's cruel to take things from younger kids.
sentence_tra: 从比自己小的孩子那里拿走东西是很残忍的。

sentence: Going on amusement park rides terrifies me.
sentence_tra: 还要再玩这种游乐设施，我受不了啊！

sentence: The athletic man runs for long distances without needing to rest.
sentence_tra: 运动员可以跑很长距离并且不用休息。

sentence: Ok, we're guilty - just please don't kill us!
sentence_tra: 好吧，我们有罪。请不要杀我们。

sentence: My twin brother and I get along very well.
sentence_tra: 我的双胞胎兄弟和我处的很好。

mean_cn: n. 姿势;  态度;  意见;
sentence: The waiter has such a bad attitude!
sentence_tra: 这个服务生态度真够差的！

mean_cn: n.青少年 ，少女 adj.青春期的，青少年的
sentence: I hate arguing with my adolescent daughter.
sentence_tra: 我讨厌和处在青春期的女儿争论。

mean_cn: n. 认识;  了解;  熟人;
sentence: We're not close friends, just acquaintances.
sentence_tra: 我们并不是亲密朋友，只是熟人而已。

mean_cn: adj. 全世界的adv. 在世界各地
sentence: Our parcel service has offices worldwide.
sentence_tra: 我们的快递服务在全世界都有办事处。

sentence: Stop making so many revisions to my book--you're ruining it!
sentence_tra: 不要再在我的书上做那么多修改了！你在摧残它！

sentence: She loved to play outside regardless of the weather.
sentence_tra: 她喜欢在外面玩，不管天气如何。

sentence: I swear that I'm telling the truth.
sentence_tra: 我发誓我讲的是实话。

mean_cn: n. 方式;  举止;  风俗, 习惯;   规矩, 风度;
sentence: The doctor spoke in a manner that made children calm.
sentence_tra: 这个医生用一种能使孩子安心的方式说话。

mean_cn: v.完成；穿过；（成功）渡过（困难时期）；打通（电话）
sentence: Once you get through the maze I'll give you a treat.
sentence_tra: 只要你穿过了这个迷宫，我就请你吃饭。

sentence: "Please forgive me!" plead the little girl after her mother punished her.
sentence_tra: “请你原谅我！”小女孩儿在她妈妈惩罚她之后求饶。

sentence: I rely a lot on my daughter's help.
sentence_tra: 我很依靠女儿的帮助。

sentence: Make sure that you try the new ride at the amusement park!
sentence_tra: 一定要试试游乐场的新过山车！

mean_cn: 根据； 以 ... 为基准
sentence: Their research was based on previous analyses.
sentence_tra: 他们的研究是基于先前的分析。

mean_cn: adj.不注意的，不顾的adv.不顾一切地，无论如何
sentence: The couple kissed regardless of the fact that the kid was watching.
sentence_tra: 这对情侣亲吻的时候，完全不顾有个孩子正在看着（他们）。

mean_cn: 跟上； 与 ... 齐步前进
sentence: She likes to keep pace with him when they are running.
sentence_tra: 跑步的时候她喜欢跟上他的步伐。

sentence: I like to spy on the family next door.
sentence_tra: 我喜欢暗中监视隔壁那家人。

sentence: I could hear the couple's quarrel from the other room.
sentence_tra: 我能听到从别的屋子传来的那对情侣的争吵声。

mean_cn: adj. 敏感的，灵敏的，感官的；易受伤害的
sentence: This area here is very sensitive - it hurts when I chew.
sentence_tra: 这个区域很敏感，当我咀嚼的时候会痛。

sentence: I can't possibly finish all of this work. It's hopeless.
sentence_tra: 绝望了，我不可能做完全部的工作。

mean_cn: n. 中止, 暂停;  踌躇;  vi. 暂停, 中止, 停顿;
sentence: You should pause for water and rest in exercise.
sentence_tra: 运动的时候你应该停下来喝点水休息一下。

sentence: Excuse me, I have to go to the washroom, I'll be out in a minute.
sentence_tra: 不好意思我想用一下洗手间，马上就好！

sentence: Babies rely on their parents for food and care.
sentence_tra: 宝宝们靠爸妈提供食物和照顾。
